title: Once Upon a Time in China

sources.title: Once Upon a Time In China (1991) Jet Li
sources.description:
Legendary martial arts hero Wong Fei-Hung fights against foreign forces' plundering of China. When Aunt Yee arrives back from America, Wong Fei-Hung assumes the role of her protector.

Original title: 黃飛鴻之一：壯志凌雲 (Wong Fei-hung)
Alternative titles: Die Schwarzen Tiger von Hongkong, Il était une fois en Chine, Érase una vez en China

Director: Tsui Hark
Writers: Tsui Hark, Yuen Kai-Chi, Leung Yiu-Ming, Elsa Tang

Main cast:
Jet Li — Wong Fei-hung
Yuen Biao — Leung Foon
Jacky Cheung — "Bucktooth" So Sai-man
Rosamund Kwan — "13th Aunt" Yee Siu-kwan
Kent Cheng — Lam Sai-wing ("Porky Wing")
Yen Shi-Kwan — "Iron Vest" Yim Chun-Tung

Genres: Action, Drama, Martial Arts
Release date: August 15, 1991 
Filming location: Hong Kong

metadata.Plot: Set in late 19th century Canton this martial arts film depicts the stance taken by the legendary martial arts hero Wong Fei-Hung (1847-1924) against foreign forces' (English, French and American) plundering of China. When Aunt Yee arrives back from America totally westernised, Wong Fei-Hung assumes the role of her protector. This proves to be difficult when his martial arts school and local militia become involved in fierce battles with foreign and local government. As violence escalates even Aunt Yee has to question her new western ideals, but is it possible to fight guns with Kung Fu?
metadata.Writer: Hark Tsui, Kai-Chi Yuen, Yiu-Ming Leung
metadata.Actors: Jet Li, Biao Yuen, Rosamund Kwan
